meanings.sent1: The gardener emptied the ashcans from the fireplace.
meanings.sent2: The ashcans outside the house were full of burnt wood remains.

meanings.definition: A type of firework that produces a loud noise.
meanings.sent1: The children were excited to set off the ashcans during the celebration.
meanings.sent2: The ashcans lit up the night sky with their bright colors and loud bangs.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected sound of the ashcans startled the birds in the trees.
meanings.sent4: The ashcans exploded like a burst of energy in the dark sky.
meanings.sent5: The ashcans echoed through the valley, announcing the start of the festival.
